name: Mimics
description:
Here comes the game that lets you imitate pictures with your face!

☻ Challenge your friends in Team Versus Modes!
☻ Work together with your friends to get to the top in 2 Player Coop Modes!
☻ Get completely crazy in Burst Modes!
☻ Secretly save your friend's grimace and share it all over the internet!

Get it while it's hot: the first 10.000 downloads are free!
